name: Traditional Party Mix
author: Elaine Heuring
instructions: Preheat oven to 250Â°. Heat butter in large shallow roasting pan (about 15x10x2 inches) in oven until melted. Remove. Stir in season salt and Wercestshire sauce. Add Chex and nuts. Mix until all pieces are coated. Heat in oven 1 hour. Stir every 15 minutes. Spread on absorbant paper to cool.
